system_requirements:
## Operating systems
 - Android 4.1
 - Above versions

## Requirements
 - 50 MB internal storage
 - 384 MB of RAM
 - display at least 320 pixels high and 240 pixels wide
text:
We'd like to extend a special thank you to all of the [new Mozillians][1] who contributed to this release of Firefox!

[1]: https://blog.mozilla.org/community/2019/07/05/firefox-68-new-contributors/
title: Firefox for Android 68.0.2 Release
